TypeSignature.Value: public interface ISessionChannel<TSession> where TSession : ISession
.class public interface auto ansi abstract ISessionChannel`1<(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISession) TSession>
generic <typename TSession> where TSession : ISessionpublic interface class ISessionChannel

Docs.typeparam: The type of associated with the cannel.
Docs.summary: Defines the interface that associates a channel with a specific type of session.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601> interface is the base interface for session-based channels. It associates the type of session with the channel by setting the generic type parameter `TSession` to a type that implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISession> interface in a way that reflects its role in the message exchange. For example, the `TSession` is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession> for an incoming session on the receiving side of a one-way communication, to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> for an outgoing session on the sending side of a one-way communication, and to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSession> for a duplex session for a bi-directional communication pattern.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601> interface provides a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> property to retrieve the session with which the channel is associated.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Session As TSession
public: property TSession Session { TSession get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the type of session associated with this channel.
Docs.value: The type of associated with this channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This returns the generic parameter `TSession` used to define the interface.
